SENDMAILACTION_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Sends an email using a mail template
FROM_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The e-mail address of the sender
TO_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The e-mail address of the destination
CC_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The email addresses to send carbon copies to
BCC_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: The email addresses to send blind carbon copies to
